SELECT CASE WHEN 48 > TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), uc.gmt_end) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS will_expire_status, uc.id rid, c.limit_amount, c.amount, c.name, c.use_rule, c.type, uc.status, uc.gmt_start, uc.gmt_end ,c.use_range,c.activity_id,c.activity_type, c.is_global,c.goods_ids,c.discount FROM af_user_coupon uc LEFT JOIN af_coupon c ON uc.coupon_id = c.id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND c.type IN ('FULLVOUCHER','DISCOUNT') AND uc.status = 'NOUSE' AND uc.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_delete = 0 AND c.status='O' AND (NOW() BETWEEN uc.gmt_start AND uc.gmt_end) AND #{amount} >= c.limit_amount ORDER BY c.amount DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT c.limit_amount,c.amount, c.name, c.use_rule, c.type,c.use_range,c.activity_id, c.quota,c.quota_already,c.limit_count,c.discount,c.id couponId, c.activity_type,c.is_global,c.goods_ids,c.expiry_type,c.valid_days,c.gmt_start,c.gmt_end FROM af_coupon c WHERE c.type IN ('FULLVOUCHER','DISCOUNT') AND c.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_show = 1 AND c.status='O' ORDER BY c.amount DESC

SELECT uc.id rid, c.limit_amount, c.amount, c.name, c.use_rule, c.type, uc.status,c.id couponId, c.gmt_start,c.gmt_end,c.use_range,c.activity_id,c.activity_type,c.quota,c.quota_already,c.limit_count, c.is_global,c.goods_ids,c.expiry_type,c.valid_days,c.gmt_start,c.gmt_end,COUNT(uc.id) user_already,c.discount FROM af_coupon c LEFT JOIN af_user_coupon uc ON (uc.coupon_id = c.id AND uc.user_id = #{userId}) WHERE c.type IN ('FULLVOUCHER','DISCOUNT') AND c.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_show = 1 AND c.status='O' GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.amount DESC
